tool.name: OTB.VectorDataExtractROI
tool.description: Perform an extract ROI on the input vector data according to the input image extent
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayio.vd False isArrayio.in False isArrayelev.geoid False output_data_io.out $output_data_io.out name OTB.VectorDataExtractROI io.vd $io.vd io.in $io.in elev.dem '$elev.dem' elev.geoid $elev.geoid elev.default $elev.default prefer $prefer response $response outputType_io.out $OutputSection_io.out.outputType_io.out transmissionMode_io.out $OutputSection_io.out.transmissionMode_io.out

param.name: io.vd
param.label: Input vector data
param.help: Input vector data The following data types are allowed in the txt file: json, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, zip, xml

param.name: io.in
param.label: Support image that specifies the extracted region
param.help: Support image that specifies the extracted region The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, png, jpeg

param.name: elev.dem
param.label: This parameter allows selecting a directory containing Digital Elevation Model files. Note that this directory should contain only DEM files. Unexpected behaviour might occurs if other images are found in this directory.
param.help: This parameter allows selecting a directory containing Digital Elevation Model files. Note that this directory should contain only DEM files. Unexpected behaviour might occurs if other images are found in this directory.

param.name: elev.geoid
param.label: Use a geoid grid to get the height above the ellipsoid in case there is no DEM available, no coverage for some points or pixels with no_data in the DEM tiles. A version of the geoid can be found on the OTB website(https://gitlab.orfeo-toolbox.org/orfeotoolbox/otb-data/blob/master/Input/DEM/egm96.grd).
param.help: Use a geoid grid to get the height above the ellipsoid in case there is no DEM available, no coverage for some points or pixels with no_data in the DEM tiles. A version of the geoid can be found on the OTB website(https://gitlab.orfeo-toolbox.org/orfeotoolbox/otb-data/blob/master/Input/DEM/egm96.grd). The following data types are allowed in the txt file: octet-stream

param.name: elev.default
param.label: This parameter allows setting the default height above ellipsoid when there is no DEM available, no coverage for some points or pixels with no_data in the DEM tiles, and no geoid file has been set. This is also used by some application as an average elevation value.
param.help: This parameter allows setting the default height above ellipsoid when there is no DEM available, no coverage for some points or pixels with no_data in the DEM tiles, and no geoid file has been set. This is also used by some application as an average elevation value.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_io.out
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

tool.help: This application extracts the vector data features belonging to a region specified by the support image envelope. Any features intersecting the support region is copied to output. The output geometries are NOT cropped.
